snippet: Fieldston and University Heights are in the same borough but worlds apart. How much understanding between their students can a well-told story bring?
abstract: Students from University Heights High School and the Ethical Culture Fieldston School, which are both located in the Bronx, have been brought together by group Narrative 4 to participate in exercise to exchange their stories and experiences; while the schools are only six miles apart, experiences of students are significantly different, given that University Heights serves the poorest congressional district in America and Fieldston charges $43,000-per-year tuition.
lead_paragraph: Fieldston and University Heights are in the same borough but worlds apart. How much understanding between their students can a well-told story bring?

keywords.value: Ethical Culture Fieldston School (New York, NY)
